trends: There have been no other sightings in Crandon
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It seemed to come out of a lake over a hill line
divs: Sighting Detailsmyself and two other boys just came out of the woods to a clearing.we were sitting on the side of a hiii.when to the north west,a disc shape camue up over what we call the west hill.the other side of a hill.there is a couple of lakes in that area first one went stright upfor a few min.it looked like it was stsndigg still.but realy was going stright away from us.then another came up.and did the same thing.it went almost out site,then turned to the right.and shot like a bullet.out of site.there was no noise. we all looked at each other, pinched each other.went to town told every one we saw.they all said not to say anying,they will think were crazy.nobody would beleave us. i tryed to go back years later.buy whin i went to the area ,on my mtoercycle.a big man came out and told me not to go any further on that firl lane.e had a12 gauge shotgun,so i went the other way. i would like to fly over the arer somttime. hav you heard this story from the two brothers? ps we were hunting. we knew it was a flying sauser right away we were about 12 and13 years old the hair on our arms stood up,we also pinch eachother arm.
